channel.title: Balint Pekker | bpekker.dev
channel.description: A collection of 'contrib' related posts | bPekker.dev

item.title: Automatic Updates
item.description: The Automatic Updates initiative will not only address the often painful process of manually installing crucial security updates but will also make it significantly easier for your Drupal site to remain up-to-date with the security advisories and the latest protections against potential threats. Let's dive into the details and see how it works.
